qas.question: How many members are in the Metropolitan Council?
Who was the first president of the metropolitan council?
What town was Patrick Ollier a mayor of?
What party does Patrick Ollier associate with?
What is the budget for Metropole?

context: The new structure is administered by a Metropolitan Council of <a0_0>210<a0_0/> members, not directly elected, but chosen by the councils of the member Communes. By 2020 its basic competencies will include urban planning, housing, and protection of the environment. The first president of the metropolitan council, <a1_0>Patrick Ollier<a1_0/>, a <a3_0>Republican<a3_0/> and the mayor of the town of <a2_0>Rueil-Malmaison<a2_0/>, was elected on January 22, 2016. Though the Metropole has a population of nearly seven million persons and accounts for 25 percent of the GDP of France, it has a very small budget; just <a4_0>65 million Euros<a4_0/>, compared with eight billion Euros for the City of Paris.
